location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The correspondence is filed in chronological order from the front to the back of the file, and terminates in a set of notes at folios 15-16. Circled serial numbers in crayon and ink (red for incoming, blue for outgoing correspondence) refer to entries in the notes.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 17; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the administration of expenditure incurred under the head of the Ministry of Works (MOW) Account of the British Agency, Sharjah, which was overseen by the Political Agency, Bahrain.The file consists of covering letters for the Ministry of Works Account of the British Agency, Sharjah for the quarters ended 30 June 1949 to 30 September 1950 inclusive from the Political Officer, Trucial Coast, Sharjah (Patrick Desmond Stobart); and from the Political Agency, Bahrain for onward transmission to the Ministry of Works Middle East Office, British Embassy, Cairo. The file does not record the actual nature of the works involved.
